success.title: Email confirmed
success.body: Your visibility report is starting now.

expired.title: Link expired
expired.body: Your confirmation link has expired. Request a new link.
expired.hint: Confirmation links are only valid for 24 hours.

invalid.title: Invalid link
invalid.body: The confirmation link is invalid or has already been used.
invalid.body_simple: Check the address or get a new link.
invalid.hint: Each link can only be used once.
